Hi. Why are there several different file sizes for this movie? Is the movie resolution better for the 1.37GB compared to the more common 700MB file size?
Yes the resolution is for big screen tv sets, I think it is not so good a 700 mb files. And the audio files are the original files and they are only 350 mb of file size.
